heading.form: Use the + button to upload XLSX/CSV files.

type.title: FILE ERROR
type.text: Only CSV files can be uploaded!

size.title: SIZE ERROR
size.text: File too large, file limit is 1MB!

repeat.title: FILE EXISTS
repeat.text: You have already uploaded this file.

clients.title: CLIENT HEADERS ERROR
clients.text: Read instructions on CLIENT UPLOAD headers!

contacts.title: CONTACT HEADERS ERROR
contacts.text: Read instructions on CONTACT UPLOAD headers!

results.title: RESULT HEADERS ERROR
results.text: Read instructions on RESULT UPLOAD headers!

dob.title: DOB ERROR
dob.text: Dates must be in yyyy-MM-dd e.g. 2023-11-21

indexCtc.title: Index CTC# ERROR
indexCtc.text: index CTC Number format must be XX-XX-XXXX-XXXXXX.

contactCtc.title: Contact CTC# ERROR
contactCtc.text: Contact CTC Number format must be XX-XX-XXXX-XXXXXX.

indexCtc.heading: Index CTC Number Error
indexCtc.prompt: Errors found in Index CTC numbers!

contactCtc.heading: Contact CTC Number Error
contactCtc.prompt: Errors found in Contact CTC numbers!

headers.heading: Headers Error
headers.prompt: Errors found in file headers, check the template!

success.title: UPLOAD SUCCESS
success.text: File has been uploaded for processing!

rejected.title: RECORDS REJECTED
rejected.text: Some records have been rejected, use download link below to get them!

section1.title: Login Instructions
section1.text: In order to upload files to UCS servers for LiftUp initiative, you need to login first. No registration needed, use the same credentials that you use to login to UCS as a provider, not CHW. If you have forgotten your UCS credentials pease contact at MOH/NACP.

section2.title: Upoading Instructions
section2.text: This tool accepts INDEX CLIENT uploads, ELICITED CONTACT uploads and CONTACT RESULTS upload. The uploads have to be in a XLSX/CSV format. The XLSX/CSV files have to include predesigned headers for them to be valid. The headers will be shown in the template section below.

section3.title: XLSX/CSV Tempates
section3.text: Use the links below to download sample XLSX/CSV templates that you can fill with your facility data and use this tool to upload them to UCS.
